Name: Raspberry Mule
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker.
Add next 3 ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir.
Garnish with lime wedge and serve with a straw.
Review: The fruity alternative to a Moscow Mule .
